topic: Research Methodology

  entities:
    Graduate Student|Person
    Research Methodology|Method
    Problem-Solving|Approach
    Questioning Strategy|Method

  proposition: I am a curious graduate student exploring innovative research methodologies in a collaborative academic environment, seeking to understand complex problem-solving techniques through unconventional questioning strategies.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Graduate Student|DESCRIBED_BY|curious
    Research Methodology|CHARACTERIZED_BY|innovative
    Problem-Solving|CHARACTERIZED_BY|complex
    Questioning Strategy|CHARACTERIZED_BY|unconventional

    entity-entity relationships:
    Graduate Student|EXPLORES|Research Methodology
    Graduate Student|SEEKS_TO_UNDERSTAND|Problem-Solving
    Graduate Student|USES|Questioning Strategy
